Desc.entry: Helps the public with legal problems. Researches the query, finds legal information and where necessary signposts to other organisations. Where appropriate asesses clients for legal aid if they want to pursue a matter any further. Offers an advocacy service for anybody who needs accompanying to a solicitor's meeting.

Address.entry: Bartolome House nr the Arts Tower

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Wed 1-3pm (drop-in, term-time only), email enquiries can be made all year round
